H0.text: what part of the brain is in the middle cranial fossa. Parietal lobes

H1.text: what part of the brain is in the middle cranial fossa. Brainstem

H2.text: what part of the brain is in the middle cranial fossa. Cerebellum

H3.text: what part of the brain is in the middle cranial fossa. temporal lobes

A4.text: It lodges the temporal lobes, and the pituitary gland.

A5.text: The lateral parts of the middle fossa are of considerable depth, and support the temporal lobes of the brain.
